pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, November 11, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, November 11, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Gr√©goire Trudeau will participate in the National Remembrance Day Ceremony.

National War Memorial
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 10 a.m.
  • Accreditation from the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery is required. For more information, contact Marc Fortier at Marc.fortier@parl.gc.ca

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
